org.svvrl.goal.core.io

Class CodecRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.io.CodecRepository

  • public class CodecRepository
extends java.lang.Object
    A CodecRepository holds all registered codecs, encoders, and decoders.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CodecRepository() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void add(int priority, Codec codec)
      Inserts a codec with a priority level.
      static Codec getCodec(java.lang.String name)
      Returns the first codec with a specified name.
      static Codec[] getCodecs()
      Returns all registered codecs.
      static Codec[] getCodecs(Editable obj)
      Returns all registered codecs that can encode a specified object.
      static Codec[] getDecodableCodecs()
      Returns all registered codecs that can handle decoding.
      static Codec[] getDecodableCodecs(Editable obj)
      Returns all registered codecs that can encode a specified object and also can do decoding.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public static void add(int priority,
                       Codec codec)
        Inserts a codec with a priority level.
        Parameters:
        priority - the priority of codec
        codec - the codec to be inserted

      • getCodecs

        public static Codec[] getCodecs()
        Returns all registered codecs. The returned codecs are sorted by their priorities.
        Returns:
        all registered codecs

      • getDecodableCodecs

        public static Codec[] getDecodableCodecs()
        Returns all registered codecs that can handle decoding. The returned codecs are sorted by their priorities.
        Returns:
        all registered codecs that can handle decoding

      • getCodecs

        public static Codec[] getCodecs(Editable obj)
        Returns all registered codecs that can encode a specified object. The returned codecs are sorted by their priorities.
        Parameters:
        obj - a object to be encoding
        Returns:
        all registered codecs that can encode obj

      • getDecodableCodecs

        public static Codec[] getDecodableCodecs(Editable obj)
        Returns all registered codecs that can encode a specified object and also can do decoding. The returned codecs are sorted by their priorities.
        Parameters:
        obj - a object to be encoding
        Returns:
        all registered codecs that can encode obj and also do decoding

      • getCodec

        public static Codec getCodec(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the first codec with a specified name.
        Parameters:
        name - a name of a codec
        Returns:
        the first codec with name name
